claims.claim: Buyers prefer a single ZIP / “download all” convenience and get frustrated by multi-file downloads.
claims.recommendedChange: Default delivery: Full_Package.zip + Start Here page; keep individual files optional.

claims.claim: Setup friction is a common reason for dissatisfaction; products need “Start Here” onboarding.
claims.recommendedChange: Require Start Here page + 3-step quickstart + app/tool-specific import guidance.

claims.claim: Licensing clarity is a frequent buyer concern (especially design templates).
claims.recommendedChange: Always include License page + license.txt; include allowed/not allowed checklist.

before: Validation based primarily on assumptions + general best practices.
Copy and delivery decisions not explicitly tied to extracted objections.
after: Validation uses Apify+SerpAPI signals to ground copy, FAQ, and delivery structure.
Quality gate includes “must-have” sections derived from real objections (download, setup, license).
Delivery default: ZIP + Start Here + Pages + folders; category-specific import/duplicate guidance.
